title: Onboarding
description: Flow from mail to next screen

elements.content: /public/Ava.png
[{"text":"Sure thing!","id":"submit"}]
Thanks! I’ll check in with you from time to time to ask about other people too, but for now I have enough to get us started. Ready for fun part?
[{"text":"Let's see","id":"submit"}]

Next week I will match you with someone interesting from your organization to spend quality time with over lunch. 

But first, let’s see how well you know your colleagues…
So good to see you!
[{"text":"Submit","id":"submit"}]
Who of the following do you know best?
Who of the following do you know best?
With whom of the following do you cooperate often?
With whom of the following do you talk on daily basis?
This is {{ firstName}} inviting {{ secondName }} to meeting.

Dear {{ firstName }},

I'm here to help you connect with your colleagues.

 

Ava
It's a match !

[{"text":"Let's do it!","id":"submit"}]
/public/Ava.png
You are officially onboarded! 🥳 Soon I’ll send you an email with connectivity data. Stay tuned!
[{"text":"Great, can't wait!","id":"submit"}]
You are the best 😘
Okay, first part done! Now, the fun part!I prepared 5 questions for you and your colleagues. Ready to start?
[{"text":"Submit","id":"submit"}]
🌴What is the name of the last song you listened to?
💃What is the name of the last TV show you watched?

Dear {{ firstName }},

I'm here to help you connect with your colleagues.

 

Ava
